- Location: Rear yard along wooden privacy fence separating property lines; fence runs parallel to structure behind carport.
- Material: Wood privacy fence, vertical boards (likely pine or cedar); typical 6 ft height.
- Condition: Boards appear intact with no visible warping or loose panels; posts look plumb from this view.
- Base/moisture: Bottom of boards in contact with soil; potential moisture exposure and rot risk if not elevated or sealed.
- Ground/debris: Bare, uneven grass area with weeds and some litter near fence; no drainage features visible.
- Utilities: Overhead power lines crossing above the fence; maintain safe clearance during maintenance.
